column1: It looks like the stay at home restrictions will be lifted for Tahiti and Moorea next week. The outer islands had restrictions lifted about a week to ten days ago. Good for them...a return to a somewhat more normal life. Not sure of status for large gatherings. No flights yet, both international and inter island.
Aita pe’ape’a. No problem in Tahitian.

Sounds good as well: "French Polynesia's health minister Jacques Reynal says testing results show that the circulation of the Covid-19 virus has been stopped."https://www.rnz.co.nz/international/pacific-…
